rules.description: Verificar que grupo_fuente_finan no tenga valores nulos
rules.query: select count(*) from dbo.mef_vw_ejecucion where grupo_fuente_finan is null

rules.description: Verificar que sectorial_sector no tenga nulos
rules.query: select count(*) from dbo.mef_vw_ejecucion where sectorial_sector is null
